# Model Card: reservoir_monitor_tiny

## Description

Reservoir Monitor is a segmentation model designed for geospatial applications.
This is the tiny variant with low capacity.

## Architecture

```mermaid
graph LR

    B --> C[Processing]
    C --> D[Decoder]
    D --> E[Output]
```

- Geospatial analysis
- Remote sensing applications
